#!/bin/bash
# defaults : "${NTPHOST:=localhost}"
# references # https://www.eecis.udel.edu/~mills/ntp/html/stats.html
NTPQPATH=$(which ntpq)
if [[ ! -f $NTPQPATH || ! -x $NTPQPATH ]]; then echo "heading,heading2" echo '<!>samplingStatus,No ntpq executable found in path' exit 0; fi
IFS=''
# first try with the -w wide option, else fall back NTPQOUTPUT=$(${NTPQPATH} -wp ${NTPHOST} 2>&1)
if [[ ${NTPQOUTPUT} =~ refused ]]; then echo '<!>samplingStatus,ntpd: connection refused - check process' exit 0; fi
if [[ $? ]]; then NTPQOUTPUT=$($NTPQPATH -p ${NTPHOST} 2>&1) fi
if [[ ${NTPQOUTPUT} =~ refused ]]; then echo "heading,heading2" echo '<!>samplingStatus,ntpd: connection refused - check process' exit 0; fi
NTPQOUTPUT=$(echo ${NTPQOUTPUT} | sed -e '/^=/d')
IFS=$'\n' regexp='^..* ' hostname="" for line in $NTPQOUTPUT; do if [[ ! $headers ]]; then headers=$(echo $line | sed -r -e 's/^\s*//' -e 's/\s+/,/g' -e 's/remote/remote,tally/' -e 's/,st,/,stratum,/' -e 's/,t,/,type,/') echo "$headers" else if [[ $hostname ]]; then output="$hostname $line" hostname="" elif [[ ! $line =~ $regexp ]]; then hostname=${line/%['\t\r\n ']} continue else output=$line hostname="" fi tally=${output:0:1} case $tally in ' ') tally="reject" ;; 'x') tally="falsetick" ;; '-') tally="outlier" ;; '+') tally="candidate" ;; '#') tally="selected" ;; '*') tally="sys.peer" ;; 'o') tally="pps.peer" ;;
esac output=${output:1} output=$(echo $output | sed -r -e 's/ +/,/g') output=$(echo $output | sed -r -e "s/,/,$tally,/") echo $output fi
done
NTPQRV=$(ntpq -crv)
NTP_VERSION=$(expr "$NTPQRV" : '.*version="\([^"]*\)"') echo "<!>ntpVersion,$NTP_VERSION"
NTP_ROOTDELAY=$(expr "$NTPQRV" : '.*rootdelay=\([-0-9\.]*\)') echo "<!>ntpRootDelay,$NTP_ROOTDELAY"
NTP_OFFSET=$(expr "$NTPQRV" : '.*offset=\([-0-9\.]*\)') echo "<!>ntpOffset,$NTP_OFFSET"
NTP_ROOTDISP=$(expr "$NTPQRV" : '.*rootdisp=\([-0-9\.]*\)') echo "<!>ntpRootDispersion,$NTP_ROOTDISP"
exit 0
